title: A self-reported symptom-based decision-making model helps to rule out outpatient cases at low risk for CRC before colonoscopy
content:
Publication date: 15 July 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 13

Author(s): Zhe Luan, Fangfang Liu, Li Zhang, Jun Chen, Yiming Zhao, Congyong Li, Zhaoyun Liu, Huawei Li, Li Dong, Funing Zang, Lingyan Han, Tianyue Zhao, Qiao Wang, Gang Sun, Shufang Wang
